releaseNotes:
What’s new: 
A new version of the memories service has appeared in OK. Now you can post short videos generated by our algorithms as well as create your own memories of precious moments! 

We have fixed an error that occurred when watching videos in AirPlay mode. Now the video is not paused when you double-tap it to fast forward or rewind. 

OK Support Team is ready for your feedback, contact us at ok.ru/help
